author: Veronika Kero
title: Learn how to start your own podcast from home with this hot deal
description: TL;DR: Take advantage of the extra free time you may have now with this online guide to starting your own podcast for $44.91, a 97% savings as of April 14. As the world keeps spinning with wide swaths of it shut down, we're all looking for ways to kill some t…
